topics.title: Algorithm & Data Structure
topics.topic_desc: Learn the fundamentals of programming. Structuring a programmer mindset with some introduction to Procedural Programming vs Object Oriented Programming, Design Pattern, etc.)

topics.title: Game Programming
topics.topic_desc: Learn how to develop games using simple programming languages

topics.title: Web Programming
topics.topic_desc: Learn how to develop web for different purposes

topics.title: Application Programming
topics.topic_desc: Learn how to design and develop applications on different platforms (iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows)

topics.title: Crypto Programming
topics.topic_desc: Learn how to make codes for cryptography, to secure apps, software and computers

topics.title: Basic Hardware Programming
topics.topic_desc: Learn to program hardware using Assembly or C/C++

name: Kids Regular Coding Class
description: ProCodeCG Kids Programming Class is a regular event every Saturday 9 - 12.

name: Kids Weekday Coding Class
description: ProCodeCG Kids Programming Class is held every Tuesday 16:00 - 17:30, Wednesday 16:30 - 18:00, Thursday & Friday 16:00 - 17:30.

name: Kids Coding Camp
description: ProCodeCG usually holds Kids Coding Camp event twice a year during school holiday. Each topic takes 3 - 5 days.

name: Online Private Class
description: ProCodeCG provides private classes with customized curriculum and more flexible schedules.

name: Tutoring Coding Class
description: ProCodeCG provides online tutoring class for high school and college students to help with their assignments, exams, competitions, etc. Each tutoring session is 90 minutes.

name: Crash Course & Customized Training
description: ProCodeCG provides customized curriculum and training. This program is usually for companies or adults.

name: Coding Mom
description: Training Moms to be front-end developers. The topics included are GitHub, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL.
